flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to serve 5 hushpuppies to each guest and he is having 20 guests so that's 5*20 = <<5*20=1000>>1000 hush puppies
He can only cook 10 hushpuppies at a time and he needs to cook 1000 hushpuppies so that's 1000/10 = <<1000/10=100>>100 batches of hushpuppies
Each batch takes 8 minutes to cook and he has 100 batches to cook so it will take him 8*100 = <<8*100=800>>800 minutes
#### 800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
